Posts.Content: LBM21 wrote: I've had lymphedema for 8 years I where a sleeve everyday. Hate BANDAGING! I've tried MLD ( very expensive) and now I'm thinking of using a pump. My theripst (insurance) won't authorize one but I know I can buy directly. I'm curious what others have experienced using a pump? Log in to post a reply
